releaseNotes: Deep Extraction Update - Multi-page analysis with site-specific extractors for comprehensive program data

fixes: Fixed 'Could not establish connection' error
Improved content script injection with fallback
Added delay to ensure script readiness
Better error handling for script injection failures
Inject all required scripts in correct order

1.6.1.description: Bug fixes for extraction and integration
fixes: Fixed duplicate content script injection error
Fixed 'Cannot read properties of undefined' error in processPageData
Fixed handleChromeExtensionData not being accessible globally
Fixed Copy to Tool button not opening program modal
Improved error handling for array processing
Better compatibility with Chrome extension message passing

1.6.0.description: Deep extraction overhaul for comprehensive analysis
features: Multi-page extraction analyzing up to 30 pages
Better program name extraction with 6+ strategies
technical: Improved description generation to avoid generic text
fixes: No more generic 'comprehensive treatment services'
Proper extraction from sites like Voyage Recovery
More thorough data extraction across pages
Better handling of autism/ASD and other specializations

features: Direct script injection for reliable data transfer
Removed complex message passing that was failing
Automatic Doc Creator tab detection and focusing
Fallback to open new tab with data if needed
Clear status messages throughout the process
fixes: Copy to Tool button now properly sends data
Extract button no longer re-runs extraction
Fixed data not appearing in Doc Creator modal
Improved error handling and recovery

features: Automatic login bypass for Chrome Extension users
Improved message passing with retry logic
Visual confirmation when data is received
fixes: Fixed encryption errors for Chrome Extension users
Fixed data not being transmitted to Doc Creator
Fixed login screen appearing for extension users
Enhanced auto-login for Chrome Extension users
Fixed session storage initialization
Fixed content-injector.js initialization
Improved data handling for Chrome Extension

1.5.1.description: Bug fixes for Chrome Extension integration
fixes: Fixed orphaned else statement syntax error
Improved error handling

features: Clinical-grade extraction system with multi-strategy detection
Real-time extraction progress with detailed statistics
Program length and family involvement extraction
Academic support and insurance information capture
technical: Rewrote popup.js with clinical data processing
Enhanced content.js with better data compilation

fixes: Fixed extraction for sites like Voyage Recovery
Improved phone number pattern matching
Better email validation and filtering

features: Editable fields for all extracted data
fixes: Button click handlers not working
ID collision issues
Template literal syntax errors
